name: Requital - Free RPG Game
description:
100% Free Little RPG /  5-10 hours / hundreds of monsters and items / great dialogue / wonderful music / good story and funny characters / alchemy and blacksmith crafting / side quests / lots of unique skills and classes

INSTALLATION: Use WinRaR to extract the .rar into a folder. Open it and run Game.exe. This is a Beta version!

Loosely inspired by the myth of Orestes:

  • King Egma – a hubristic, fat old king who deserves what he gets.
  • Iphessa – his precious little girl who likes flowers but might need to be sacrificed.
  • Aego – his right hand man, a clever astrologer who seems to be plotting something.
  • Klyma –  Egma’s wife who loves little Iphessa most of all, but really has the hots for Aego…
  • Areste – his good son, a priest who’s not totally sure he believes Dad’s faith anymore and sort of wants to chop Mum's head off.
  • Chryso – his drunk of a daughter, who hangs out with street thugs and talks trash with her fists.
  • Laodi – his special daughter, a wizard who knows better than everybody else.

                                       

I'm just a Classics nerd with a cat who designed and wrote this for fun with RPGMakerMV. I will listen carefully to your suggestions: oberonrpgs[at]gmail.com.
